message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.bukkit.entity.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.bukkit.event.entity.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.bukkit.event.player.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Map' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.utils.Utils'.
